TITLE Ashley's Jello Pretzle Dish

# Preheat oven to 400F
# Stir together [2 cup pretzles] crushed and [0.75 cup butter] melted, [3 tbl sugar].
# Press into bottom of 9x13 baking dish
# Bake 8-10 minutes, and cool
# Cream the [8 oz cream cheese] softened and [1 cup sugar]
# Fold in [8 oz cool whip]
# Spread mixture on the cooled crust
# Dissolve [6 oz strawberry jello] in [2 cup boiling water]
# Stir in [20 oz frozen strawberries] and allow mixture to partially set
# Pour jello mixture on top of cream cheese layer
# Refrigerate until set
